about_the_game:
There was only darkness in the world, and humans and other beasts could only huddle around the beasts that could emit light, worship them, and pray for light and safety, so that many tribes gradually formed.
Jinwu this alien race is a kind of alien animal that can emit the most dazzling light, and the light emitted by a Jinwu can even shine the whole world. One day, the Jin Wu ethnic group could not bear to see the world shrouded in darkness, so the Jin Wu discussed that all the capable Jin Wu took turns flying in the sky for a period of time every day, shining with all their strength to shine on the world and bring light to the world.
Then the world had day and night; Sometimes a group of golden flowers outstanding ability, emit a particularly strong light, it becomes summer; Some golden black ability is less, the light is not enough to bring warmth to the world, there is winter; Such a cycle becomes four levels, and there is a chronology.
Humans left the other beasts and established their own tribes, which later developed into nations. All praise Jinwu, all venerate Jinwu, even those who have lost their devotees praise Jinwu's selflessness.
But one exotic animal is an exception: Bi Fang.
Bi Fang jealous of Jin Wu, it feels that they also have the ability to make the world bright, why only Jin Wu by such worship.
Bi Fang also flew to the sky, and it has been using its power, and never rest.
But Bifang's power is to generate a raging fire, and the glow of the flame does bring light, but it also brings deadly heat, and Bifang never rests, neither day nor night nor seasons.
The creatures were ruined, and many powerful beasts could not bear to see, and the beasts and humans united to seal up Bi Fang.
But after many years, the seal began to loosen, and something had to be done to solve the problem

Yinghuo is chosen to solve the problem, but her brother Qiming has some misunderstandings about this...

Players will control the protagonist "Yinghuo", defeat several evil beasts, help people in need of help, strengthen their abilities, find and save their brother "Qiming", seal the culprit "Bi Fang".



Finally, I would like to say something that the producer wants to say. This game is the producer's first finished game. There are many shortcomings and shortcomings, and there may be many problems and bugs
